flawed_nl_solution:
Bucket B has 3 more fruits than C (which has 9 fruits) for a total of 9+3 = <<3+9=12>>12 fruits
Bucket A has 4 more fruits than B (which has 12 fruits) for a total of 12+4 = <<4+12=21>>21 fruits
All three buckets have a total of 9+12+21 = <<9+12+21=42>>42 fruits

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 21. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
